Yazamo create SaaS marketing products. Our flagship product is LeadQuizzes. LeadQuizzes helps small businesses create high converting quizzes to capture leads and create sales without needing to hire a programmer. Industry leaders like Neil Patel and Lewis Howes choose LeadQuizzes to develop their quizzes. Our users have generated over 2,000,000 leads since 2016.
Ellens Technologies develops veterinary apps. VetDx, is their flagship mobile application which help veterinarians diagnose animals by developing a thorough list of rule outs.

The guys at yazamo have an aptitude for design, UI and understand the importance of the right mix of features and functionality. They pay close attention to their clients vision and ideas throughout consultation sessions and capture the essence of the project. In other words, they create something that not only looks visually right on, but also reflects your values, concepts, products, and your organization, a rare find in a space overflowing with mediocrity.

Mike is one of the most diversely talented people I know.  He joined Yazamo at a time when we were building out many of our processes and Mike stepped into any and every role to help us grow.  He is someone who takes ownership of his position and is not afraid of hard work in the least. Mike was absolutely committed to the vision of Yazamo and was willing to do everything he could to help us achieve our goals. Mike is definitely a team player and someone I recommend without hesitation.

summary: Jeremy is the cofounder of Yazamo a SaaS marketing company that specializes in generating leads and sales for small to mid size businesses through their product LeadQuizzes. He is an expert in internet marketing and lead generation and has grown LeadQuizzes from zero to more than $1,000,000 in just six months. He is frequently featured in Entrepreneur magazine and he and his team have won numerous awards and accolades.
